Uses of Interface
com.cyc.kb.KbPredicate

  • Packages that use KbPredicate 
    Package Description
    com.cyc.kb
    Interfaces for manipulating CycL-based java objects, both for the purpose of making assertions and for retrieving terms and values via simple queries.
    com.cyc.kb.spi
    All KB API service provider interfaces.
    com.cyc.nl
    Provides support for the NL API, which translates back and forth between CycL and natural language.

    • Uses of KbPredicate in com.cyc.kb

      Subinterfaces of KbPredicate in com.cyc.kb 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  BinaryPredicate
      The interface for KbPredicates that take exactly two arguments.
      Methods in com.cyc.kb that return KbPredicate 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      KbPredicate KbPredicate.addGeneralization(KbPredicate moreGeneral, Context ctx)
      creates a new Fact stating that moreGeneral is a more general predicate than this in the context.
      KbPredicate KbPredicate.addGeneralization(String moreGeneralStr, String ctxStr)
      creates a new Fact stating that moreGeneral is a more general predicate than this in the context ctx.
      KbPredicate KbPredicate.addSpecialization(KbPredicate moreSpecific, Context ctx)
      creates a new Fact stating that this is a more specific predicate than moreSpecific in the specified context.
      KbPredicate KbPredicate.addSpecialization(String moreSpecificStr, String ctxStr)
      creates a new Fact stating that this is a more specific predicate than moreSpecific in the specified context.
      static KbPredicate KbPredicateFactory.findOrCreate(String nameOrId)
      Find or create a KbPredicate object named nameOrId.
      static KbPredicate KbPredicateFactory.findOrCreate(String nameOrId, KbCollection constraintCol)
      Find or create a KbPredicate object named nameOrId, and also make it an instance of constraintCol in the default context specified by DefaultContext.forAssertion().
      static KbPredicate KbPredicateFactory.findOrCreate(String nameOrId, KbCollection constraintCol, Context ctx)
      Find or create a KbPredicate object named nameOrId, and also make it an instance of constraintCol in ctx.
      static KbPredicate KbPredicateFactory.findOrCreate(String nameOrId, String constraintColStr)
      Find or create a KbPredicate object named nameOrId, and also make it an instance of constraintCol in the default context specified by DefaultContext.forAssertion().
      static KbPredicate KbPredicateFactory.findOrCreate(String nameOrId, String constraintColStr, String ctxStr)
      Find or create a KbPredicate object named nameOrId, and also make it an instance of constraintCol in ctx.
      static KbPredicate KbPredicateFactory.get(String nameOrId)
      Get the KbPredicate with the name nameOrId.
      Methods in com.cyc.kb that return types with arguments of type KbPredicate 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Collection<KbPredicate> KbPredicate.getGeneralizations()
      finds the asserted generalizations of this, from the default context specified by DefaultContext.forQuery()
      Collection<KbPredicate> KbPredicate.getGeneralizations(Context ctx)
      finds the asserted generalizations of this, from the context ctx.
      Collection<KbPredicate> KbPredicate.getGeneralizations(String ctxStr)
      finds the asserted generalizations of this, from a context ctx.
      Collection<KbPredicate> KbPredicate.getSpecializations()
      finds the asserted specializations of this Predicate, from the default context specified by DefaultContext.forQuery().
      Collection<KbPredicate> KbPredicate.getSpecializations(Context ctx)
      finds the asserted specializations of this KbPredicate, from the context ctx
      Collection<KbPredicate> KbPredicate.getSpecializations(String ctxStr)
      finds the asserted specializations of this KbPredicate, from the context ctx.
      Methods in com.cyc.kb with parameters of type KbPredicate 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Fact KbObject.addFact(Context ctx, KbPredicate pred, int thisArgPos, Object... otherArgs)
      finds or creates a new Fact in the underlying KB
      KbPredicate KbPredicate.addGeneralization(KbPredicate moreGeneral, Context ctx)
      creates a new Fact stating that moreGeneral is a more general predicate than this in the context.
      KbPredicate KbPredicate.addSpecialization(KbPredicate moreSpecific, Context ctx)
      creates a new Fact stating that this is a more specific predicate than moreSpecific in the specified context.
      Fact KbObject.getFact(Context ctx, KbPredicate pred, int thisArgPos, Object... otherArgs)
      find the specific existing Fact, in ctx, that has pred as its predicate, this in the thisArgPos argument position, and otherArgs as its other arguments.
      Collection<Fact> KbObject.getFacts(KbPredicate predicate, int thisArgPos, Context ctx)
      gets the asserted Facts visible from ctx, using the predicate predicate with this at position thisArgPos of the Fact
      Sentence KbPredicate.getGeneralizationSentence(KbPredicate moreGeneral)
      This method returns the Sentence (#$genlPreds this moreGeneral).
      Sentence KbPredicate.getInverseGeneralizationSentence(KbPredicate moreGeneral)
      This method returns the Sentence (#$genlInverse this moreGeneral).
      Sentence KbObject.getSentence(KbPredicate pred, int thisArgPos, Object... otherArgs)
      construct a sentence, that has pred as its predicate, this in the thisArgPos argument position, and otherArgs as its other arguments.
      <O> Collection<O> KbObject.getValues(KbPredicate pred, int thisArgPos, int getArgPos, Context ctx)
      This method gets all facts with predicate pred and this at the thisArgPos arg position of the fact, as visible from ctx, and returns as O objects based on the arguments in the getArgPos argument position of the facts.
      <O> Collection<O> KbObject.getValues(KbPredicate pred, int thisArgPos, int getArgPos, Object matchArg, int matchArgPos, Context ctx)
      This method gets all facts visible from ctx that use predicate pred, have this in the thisArgPos arg position, and also have matchArg in the matchArgPos arg position; it returns a list of O objects from the getArgPos argument position of the fact.
      boolean KbObject.isAsserted(Context ctx, KbPredicate pred, int thisArgPos, Object... otherArgs)
      Is there an assertion in ctx with a sentence using pred, with this in the thisArgPos argument position, and with the arguments in otherArgs as the rest of its arguments? This method will not throw exceptions.
      boolean KbPredicate.isGeneralizationOf(KbPredicate moreSpecific, Context ctx)
      Determine whether this is a generalization of moreSpecific in the context ctx.
